languages.text: "Если подумать, его падение было лишь вопросом времени. Он потерял бдительность и стал совершать ошибки. Он подписал себе приговор, когда решил пойти против Чорда вместо того, чтобы искать способ договориться. Вы лишь поставили финальную точку в его судьбе".

"Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."
languages.original_text: "Если подумать, его падение было лишь вопросом времени. Он потерял бдительность и стал совершать ошибки. Он подписал себе приговор, когда решил пойти против Чорда вместо того, чтобы искать способ договориться. Вы лишь поставили финальную точку в его судьбе".

traits.locale_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. You merely filled in the last line in his fate."

"Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. You merely filled in the last line in his fate."

"Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. You merely filled in the last line in his fate."

"Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. You merely filled in the last line in his fate."

"Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

"Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

languages.text: 「考えてもみて、彼の失墜はもはや時間の問題だったわ。気が緩んで、ミスを犯し始めたの。交渉の道を模索する代わりにチョーダに対抗しようとした時点で、自身の死の認可状に調印したようなものよ。あなたは最後の仕上げをしただけ」
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

traits.locale_text: 「考えてもみて、彼の失墜はもはや時間の問題だったわ。気が緩んで、ミスを犯し始めたの。交渉の道を模索する代わりにチョーダに対抗しようとした時点で、自身の死の認可状に調印したようなものよ。あなたは最後の仕上げをしただけ」

languages.text: « Quand on y réfléchit, sa chute était courue d'avance. Il avait baissé la garde et commençait à faire des erreurs. Il a signé son propre arrêt de mort en décidant de s'opposer à Chorda au lieu de chercher un levier de négociation. Vous n'avez jamais fait que lui porter le coup de grâce. »
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

traits.locale_text: « Quand on y réfléchit, sa chute était courue d'avance. Il avait baissé la garde et commençait à faire des erreurs. Il a signé son propre arrêt de mort en décidant de s'opposer à Chorda au lieu de chercher un levier de négociation. Vous n'êtes {mf|intervenu|intervenue} qu'à la toute fin d'un destin qu'il avait déjà tracé lui-même. »

languages.text: “想想看，他的死不过只是个时间问题罢了。他放松了警惕，开始犯错误。他不打算和库尔达谈判，而是和她正面爆发了冲突。那个时候，他就相当于亲手给自己判了死刑，你仅仅是给他不可避免的结果画了个句号而已。”
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

traits.locale_text: “想想看，他的死不过只是早晚罢了。他放松了警惕，开始犯错误。他不打算和库尔达谈判，而是和她正面爆发了冲突。那个时候，他就相当于亲手给自己判了死刑，你仅仅是给他不可避免的结果画了个句号而已。”

languages.text: "Genau betrachtet war sein Sturz nur eine Frage der Zeit. Er hatte seine Deckung gesenkt und begonnen, Fehler zu machen. Und sein Todesurteil hat er dann selbst unterzeichnet, als er beschloss, gegen Chorda vorzugehen, anstatt nach Verhandlungsmöglichkeiten zu suchen. Ihr habt dem Ganzen nur den letzten Schliff verliehen."
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

traits.locale_text: "Genau betrachtet war sein Sturz nur eine Frage der Zeit. Er hatte seine Deckung gesenkt und begonnen, Fehler zu machen. Und sein Todesurteil hat er dann selbst unterzeichnet, als er beschloss, gegen Chorda vorzugehen, anstatt nach Verhandlungsmöglichkeiten zu suchen. Ihr wart lediglich das letzte Puzzlestück seines Schicksals."

languages.text: «A decir verdad, su hora le llegaría de un modo u otro. Bajó la guardia y empezó a hacer las cosas mal. Al enfrentarse a Chorda en lugar de negociar, acabó cavando su propia tumba. Usted solo ha puesto el broche final».
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

traits.locale_text: «A decir verdad, su hora le llegaría de un modo u otro. Bajó la guardia y empezó a hacer las cosas mal. Al enfrentarse a Chorda en lugar de negociar, acabó cavando su propia tumba. Usted solo ha puesto el broche final».

languages.text: "Konusu açılmışken diyeyim, Vladaym'ın çöküşü zaten an meselesiydi. Tedbiri elden bırakmış, hata yapmaya başlamıştı. Pazarlık etmenin yollarını aramaktansa Chorda'ya karşı gelmeye karar verdiği gün kendi ölüm fermanını da imzalamış oldu. Siz yalnızca son dokunuşu yaptınız."
languages.original_text: "Come to think of it, his fall was only a matter of time. He let his guard down and started making mistakes. He signed his own death warrant when he decided to go against Chorda instead of looking for ways to negotiate. What you did was just the finishing touch."

traits.locale_text: "Konusu açılmışken, Vladaym'ın ölümü sadece an meselesiydi. Tedbiri elden bırakmış, hata yapmaya başlamıştı. Pazarlık etmenin bir yolunu aramaktansa Chorda'ya karşı gelmeye karar verince kendi ölüm fermanını imzalamış oldu."
